report.title: Sample pack requests by workflow status
report.definition: Admin report listing sample packs for all users by status.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional s JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf ON snf.id = s.id LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav ON sav.sample_id = s.id AND sav.sample_attribute_id = 1161 LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms tlt ON tlt.id = sav.int_value #joins# WHERE s.website_id = #website_id# AND s.survey_id = #survey_id# AND (#workflow_status# = sav.int_value OR #workflow_status# = 0) AND ('#record_status#' = s.record_status OR '#record_status#' = '0') AND CASE WHEN #year# = 0 THEN true WHEN #year# = 1 THEN date_part('year', s.created_on) = date_part('year', now()) WHEN #year# = 2 THEN date_part('year', s.created_on) = date_part('year', now() - interval '1 year') END

param.name: workflow_status
param.lookup_values: 14412:Pack requested,14150:Pack sent,14151:Sample received, 14413:Sugar results added,14414:Sequencing complete,14415:Species results added,14683:Sample discounted

column.name: record_status
column.sql: CASE WHEN s.record_status = 'I' THEN 'Incomplete' WHEN s.record_status = 'C' THEN 'Complete' END
